items.summary: Apply CSS fix to frontend/src/pages/Transaction.tsx or frontend/src/index.css to resolve VAT Category dropdown being overshadowed by setting overflow: visible on all elements, z-index: 9999 on select elements, z-index: 99999 on dropdown-menu class, and overflow: visible on tabs, tab-content, grid, column, and card classes
Limit VAT Category dropdown visible items to maximum 3 options at a time with scrolling enabled for remaining options in frontend/src/pages/Transaction.tsx
